name: Old Town
description: The original settlement area with ancient buildings and narrow streets; adventurers can discover historical secrets, find hidden passages, or encounter ghosts of the past.
atmosphere: Narrow, winding streets are lined with buildings that have stood for centuries, their stone walls worn smooth by time. The air carries the weight of history, with ancient architecture and weathered facades telling stories of the past. The atmosphere is one of mystery and age, with hidden courtyards and forgotten alleys around every corner.
